name: blogApp
description: Coding challenge - Creating a blog application in Node and express and using Bootstrap for styling. # Setup: * Make sure you have node and express installed on your computer. * Fork. (If you want a different name then clone first, create your own repo and copy my files in there) * Clone repo to local. * Open terminal in newly cloned file. * run: express --view=ejs to install modules and follow the prompts to install dependencies and start the app.
